problem.markdown:
1. If longest link is fixed and shortest link is coupler which type of four bar mechanism would be formed?
(x) Double Rocker () Double Crank () Crank Rocker () Can't be determined
2. According to Grashof Condition
(x) s+l less than p+q () s+p greater than l+q () s+l greater than p+q () s+p less than l+q
3. In Drag Link Mechanism
() Any link can be fixed () Longest link is fixed () One other than shortest or longest link is fixed (x) Shortest link is fixed
4. Which of the following is possible for Input and Output links in case of Grashof linkage?
() Rocker-Rocker () Crank-Rocker (x) All () Crank-Crank
5. If Grashof condition is met, which link definitely can complete a rotation
() Shorter of the remaining links () Longest Link (x) Shortest Link () Longer of the remaining two links
